newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Southern Pacific started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Southern Pacific started.

text.p: Gruntal & Co said on Thursday it started coverage of Southern Pacific Funding Corp with a strong buy rating and a 12-month target of $22 per share.
-- Analyst Kristina Blecher said in research note her 1997 earnings estimate was $2.30 per share and her 1998 earnings estimate was $3.12 per share.
-- "Southern Pacific is a pure play home equity lender possessing solid growth and impressive efficiency, all while trading at a significant discount to its peers," she said.
